remark.p: Non-career appointee. Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary (Switzerland); Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary (Portugal); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Japan); Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary (China); Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary (Brazil); Envoy Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary (Belgium).
